entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
